start.header: Apply for a domestic licence for controlled substances

sign-in.header: Sign in to apply for a domestic licence to produce, supply or possess controlled drugs

session-timeout-warning.dialog-title: You will exit this form soon
session-timeout-warning.dialog-text: If you are signed in, your answers will be kept from the last saved page. Any progress on this page will not be saved. If you are not signed in, your answers will be permanently deleted.
